item.title: Virtualbox安装配置alpine
item.description: 1.安装virtualbox 2.安装alpine linux 参考 https://wiki.alpinelinux.org/wiki/Install_Alpine_on_VirtualBox apk add nano vim curl wget git mercurial subversion curl https://j.mp/spf13-vim3 -L spf13-vim.sh && sh spf13-vim.sh nano /etc/ssh/sshd_config rc-service sshd restart 服务管理 https://wiki.alpinelinux.org/wiki/Alpine_Linux_Init_System 3.在alpine linux中安
